mobs.long_desc: A small innocent looking green beetle is here.
mobs.desc: Its small and harmless looking.

mobs.long_desc: A small innocent looking firefly is hovering here.
mobs.desc: It's just a small, harmless looking little firefly. Like all fireflies, it's very plain-looking, till dusk.

mobs.long_desc: A brilliant blue bug buzzes past.
mobs.desc: It's a tiny bug that almost looks like a dragonfly, except it's a brilliant shining blue all over.

mobs.long_desc: There is an ugly mottled brown jumping spider here.
mobs.desc: It's rather large for a spider -- about the size of a dog. It doesn't seem to take any particular interest in you, preferring to nibble on the farmer's crops instead.

mobs.long_desc: There is an extremely ugly cockroach scurrying through the crops here.
mobs.desc: Every woman's nightmare, a 3-foot long cockroach!

mobs.long_desc: There is a large green grasshopper hopping around here.
mobs.desc: Have you ever seen such a BIG grasshopper? It seems to think that the grass around here is quite tasty.

mobs.long_desc: There is an annoying cricket chirping loudly here.
mobs.desc: You see a brown, long-legged insect that never seems to stop making an infernal "chirp, chirp, CHIRP" sort of noise. It's quite loud.

mobs.long_desc: There is a cute young ladybug sunning herself here.
mobs.desc: Her bright red body with black polkadots is surprisingly fashionable for an insect. She doesn't seem to be hurting anything.

mobs.long_desc: There is a black and orange striped beetle here.
mobs.desc: The striped beetle is busily chewing the leaves of nearby plants. It hasn't noticed you as it begins to eat yet another leaf.

mobs.long_desc: There is a large black ant here looking for food.
mobs.desc: The large black ant appears to be too busy searching the fields for food to be bothered by the likes of you.

mobs.long_desc: A large brown beetle is here, looking for some flowers to chew up.
mobs.desc: This grotesquely long beetle has a shiny, chitinous shell. It moves in a ponderous way, swaying this way and that on segmented legs. Long feelers jut out in front of its huge body.

mobs.long_desc: A huge black spider is here, looking for insect prey.
mobs.desc: This huge spider is quite black, and oddly enough, appears covered in dark fuzz. Its tiny head is dominated by multi-faceted eyes, and its thorax pinches off to almost nothing, to grow into a huge, distended belly typical of arachnids. Its eight legs bear it in a delicate manner, though its massive size -- easily shoulder-high to any human -- makes it slower.

mobs.long_desc: A red fire ant scurries through the field.
mobs.desc: This ant is much larger than most creatures of its kind, being nearly the size of a rat. Its red exoskeleton is quite shiny. Long mandibles poke out of its mouth.

mobs.long_desc: A tough looking army ant is here.
mobs.desc: This large ant is much bigger than most ants of its species, being almost the size of a rat. Moving quickly and determinedly through whatever obstacles lie in its path, it seeks food with long mandibles.

mobs.long_desc: The majestic praying mantis stands here, surveying the fields.
mobs.desc: You have never before seen such a regal looking insect as this creature that now stands before you. These insect friends to the farmers are not often seen by human eyes. Standing nearly 7 feet tall, the praying mantis surveys the fields, looking for insect prey, while leaving the farmers and their crops undisturbed.

mobs.long_desc: A small blue dragon is flapping about freezing everything in sight!
mobs.desc: A chilly mist flows continually from its nostrils as it flaps its wings to stay aloft.  Its hide is a light blue, and it hisses viciously at lost newbies.

mobs.long_desc: A small black dragon is flapping about burning everything in sight!
mobs.desc: The Drakling is a glossy black, its shiny scales reflecting its young age. Gouts of flame flare from its nostrils, burning the crops around it.

mobs.long_desc: A small green dragon is flapping about mesmerizing everything in sight!
mobs.desc: Flapping its vibrant green wings, this small green drakling projects a mesmerizing aura around itself, drawing newbies unaware to their demise.

mobs.long_desc: A small red dragon named Wug is flapping about eating all the newbies. &1&bRUN AWAY!&0
mobs.desc: Small for a dragon, Wug is nontheless quite voracious, with a full mouth of razor-sharp teeth.  It looks around hungrily, ready to chomp on the next newbie coming his way.

mobs.long_desc: A mysterious cloaked ranger stands in the shadows.
mobs.desc: A tall, slender elf stands here silently.  He wears a dark green cloak that gracefully drapes to his ankles.  A handcrafted longbow is slung over his shoulder.  There are glowing runes covering the length of the great weapon. The ranger makes no attempt to hide an elven holy symbol that hangs around his neck from a thin, silver cord of silk.  His facial expression is solemn as he surveys the area.

objects.ground: A little stone well stands here.

extras.text: It's just a simply constructed stone well, made with an eye toward durability and ease of construction. The water inside seems clean and pure.
It's a reasonably healthy specimen, with a long orange root and a feathery green head.

objects.ground: A ripe red tomato grows on a trellis.

extras.text: It's round and red, just soft enough to be ripe. It smells inviting.

objects.ground: A golden wheat stalk lies here in the corner.
A vine-ripened red tomato lies here.
A wine rack collects dust and mold here.

extras.text: A medium-sized wine rack sits here, part of the farmer's collection of vintage wines from over the years.  Perhaps there's some left inside!

objects.ground: A vintage bottle of wine rests here.

extras.text: This bottle contains a rare, vintage wine.  It was carefully made from vine-ripened grapes, pressed, and fermented to produce a classic.

objects.ground: A barrel of beer sits upright on the floor.

extras.text: A well-constructed, watertight container, this barrel contains enough beer for a party!

objects.ground: A small blue scale lies here.
A small black scale lies here.
A small green scale lies here.
A small Fiery Red scale lies here.

extras.text: This odd little draconic scale is burning with some sort of internal fire, making it quite warm but bearable to the touch.  It seems to impart some of its fieryness into its holder, promising power and strength to its wearer.

objects.ground: A small tusk of some kind burns on the ground.

triggers.name: ice_drake_death
triggers.commands: * * Now for the cycle portion.. * * Does next mob in spawn cycle already exist? If %get.mob_count[8032]% < 1 * Generate random room number to spawn drakes in. * Thanks to the evil Pergus for inspiring me to be * more evil. set rnd_range %random.126% eval rnd_room %rnd_range% + 8049 mat 16095 mload mob 8032 set rnd %random.100% mat 16095 mteleport ash %rnd_room% * Sometimes creatures don't get teleported out of the loading * room so we're gonna go back and purge it just incase. mat 16095 mpurge mecho %self.name% cries out for help from his ashen brother! mecho From somewhere else in the farmlands comes another mighty roar! mload obj 8031 endif * * *

triggers.name: ash_drake_death
triggers.commands: * * Now for the cycle portion.. * * Does next mob in spawn cycle already exist? If %get.mob_count[8033]% < 1 * Generate random room number to spawn drakes in. * Thanks to the evil Pergus for inspiring me to be * more evil. set rnd_range %random.126% eval rnd_room %rnd_range% + 8049 mat 16095 mload mob 8033 set rnd %random.100% mat 16095 mteleport emerald %rnd_room% * Sometimes creatures don't get teleported out of the loading * room so we're gonna go back and purge it just incase. mat 16095 mpurge mecho %self.name% cries out for help from his emerald brother! mecho From somewhere else in the farmlands comes another mighty roar! mload obj 8032 endif * * *

triggers.name: emerald_drake_death
triggers.commands: * * Now for the cycle portion.. * * Does next mob in spawn cycle already exist? If %get.mob_count[8034]% < 1 * Generate random room number to spawn drakes in. * Thanks to the evil Pergus for inspiring me to be * more evil. set rnd_range %random.126% eval rnd_room %rnd_range% + 8049 mat 16095 mload mob 8034 set rnd %random.100% mat 16095 mteleport wug %rnd_room% * Sometimes creatures don't get teleported out of the loading * room so we're gonna go back and purge it just incase. mat 16095 mpurge mecho %self.name% cries out for help from his brother Wug! mecho From somewhere else in the farmlands comes another mighty roar! mload obj 8033 endif * * *

triggers.name: wug_drake_death
triggers.commands: say You have vanquished me for now but I will return! mload obj 8034 * * Death trigger for random gem and armor drops * * set a random number to determine if a drop will * happen. * * boss setup * set bonus %random.100% set will_drop %random.100% * 3 pieces of armor per sub_phase in phase_1 set what_armor_drop %random.3% * 4 classes questing in phase_1 set what_gem_drop %random.4% * if %will_drop% <= 20 * drop nothing and bail halt endif if %will_drop% <= 60 * Normal non-bonus drops if %bonus% <= 50 * drop a gem from the previous wear pos set eval gem_vnum %what_gem_drop% + 55585 mload obj %gem_vnum% elseif (%bonus% >= 51 &%bonus% <= 90) * We're in the Normal drops from current wear pos set * drop a gem from the current wear pos set eval gem_vnum %what_gem_drop% + 55589 mload obj %gem_vnum% else * We're in the BONUS ROUND!! * drop a gem from the next wear pos set eval gem_vnum %what_gem_drop% + 55593 mload obj %gem_vnum% endif elseif (%will_drop% >=61 &%will_drop% <= 80) * Normal non-bonus drops if %bonus% <= 50 * drop destroyed armor 55299 is the vnum before the * first piece of armor. eval armor_vnum %what_armor_drop% + 55319 mload obj %armor_vnum% elseif (%bonus% >= 51 &%bonus% <= 90) * We're in the Normal drops from current wear pos set * drop armor from the current wear pos set eval armor_vnum %what_armor_drop% + 55323 mload obj %armor_vnum% else * We're in the BONUS ROUND!! * drop a piece of armor from next wear pos eval armor_vnum %what_armor_drop% + 55327 mload obj %armor_vnum% endif else * Normal non-bonus drops if %bonus% <= 50 * drop armor and gem from previous wear pos eval gem_vnum %what_gem_drop% + 55585 eval armor_vnum %what_armor_drop% + 55319 mload obj %gem_vnum% mload obj %armor_vnum% elseif (%bonus% >= 51 &%bonus% <= 90) * We're in the Normal drops from current wear pos set * drop a gem and armor from the current wear pos set eval armor_vnum %what_armor_drop% + 55323 mload obj %armor_vnum% eval gem_vnum %what_gem_drop% + 55589 mload obj %gem_vnum% else * We're in the BONUS ROUND!! * drop armor and gem from next wear pos eval gem_vnum %what_gem_drop% + 55593 mload obj %gem_vnum% eval armor_vnum %what_armor_drop% + 55327 mload obj %armor_vnum% endif endif

triggers.name: fly_away
triggers.commands: * * this is intended to make the creature fly off * to a random room to avoid high levels killing * it.. * * Exception written in to allow players on the * dragon hunt to kill them. * * Generate random room number to spawn drakes in. * Thanks to the evil Pergus for inspiring me to be * more evil. if %actor.level% > 30 && %actor.quest_stage[dragon_slayer]% != 3 set rnd_range %random.126% eval rnd_room %rnd_range% + 8049 mecho %self.name% flies off because you seem to be a bit to powerful. mecho (Let the newbies < 30 do this) mteleport drakling %rnd_room% endif

triggers.name: Morgan_hill_newbie_guard
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 if %actor.level% < 10 return 1 msend %actor% %self.name% places a hand in front of you. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% places a hand up in front of %actor.name%. whisper %actor.name% Hold on there!  South of here is terribly dangerous for someone of your skill. wait 1s whisper %actor.name% I suggest adventuring elsewhere for now. bow %actor.name% else return 0 endif else return 0 endif

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: A dirt road stretches from here to the east for some distance, leading to a large walled city.  A small path leads off into the fields to the south.  The forest is quite thick to the north, but another, more established road begins to the west.

East.description: Farmer's Row continues to the east.

West.description: You see an old merchant's trail.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: The farmers have divided the fields into four areas and rotate the crops each season to preserve the soil.  The four crops are carrots, clover, tomatoes, and wheat.  Farmer's Row continues on to the east and west.  The forest to the north is impassable.  The carrot fields are to the south.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: The road is quite popular and travelers often stop and visit with the farmers.  Farmer's Row continues on to the east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  The carrot fields are to the south.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impassable.  The carrot fields are south of here.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  Carrot fields are to the south.  Further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north breaks briefly for a little dirt road that leads away among the trees.  The carrot fields are to the south.  Far to the east is the village of Mielikki.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues on to the east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  To the south is the Western path through the fields. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

South.description: You see the Eastern path through the fields.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues to the east and west.  The forest to the north is impassable.  To the south is the clover field.  Further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues to the east and west.  The forest to the north is mostly impassible, but there is a narrow break in the trees that looks like an enterprising adventurer could squeeze through.  The clover field is to the south, and further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  To the south is the clover field.  Further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  The clover fields are to the south.  Further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  The clover field is to the south.  Further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  The Main path through the fields is to the south.  Further to the south there is a well.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

South.description: You see the main path through the fields. Further to the south you see a well.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues to the east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  The tomato patch is to the south.  Further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  The tomato patch is to the south.  Further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  The tomato fields are to the south.  Further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

West.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  To the south is the tomato field.  Further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  The tomato patch is to the south.  Further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  To the south is the Eastern path through the fields.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

South.description: You see the east path through the fields.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  The wheat field is to the south.  Further east is the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row Intersection
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues to the east and west.  The forest to the north is thick and imposing, but an opening reveals a dusty path leading north.  The wheat field is to the south.  To the east is the entrance to a temple, and beyond that, the west gate leading to town.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  The wheat field is to the south.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Due east is the west gate leading to town.

South.description: You see the wheat fields. The tall wheat is golden in color.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: Farmer's Row continues east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  The wheat field is to the south.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

South.description: You see the wheat fields. The tall grains will soon be ready to harvest.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: The farmers have divided the fields into 4 areas.  They rotate the crops each season to preserve the soil and their beloved land.  Farmer's Row continues on to the east and west.  The forest to the north is impossible to enter.  The wheat field is to the south.

East.description: You see Farmer's Row. Further east is the west gate leading to town.

South.description: You see wheat fields, the tall golden wheat almost ready to harvest.

rooms.name: Farmer's Row
rooms.description: This is an east-west dirt road north of the farmlands.  The west gate is visible just to the east, and the road itself stretches far to the west.  To the south, a vast expanse of fields can be clearly seen.  An open archway stands to the north, leading to a small building.

East.description: You see outside the west gate. Further east is the town.

rooms.name: Along The Western Fence (26)
rooms.description: A small dirt path leading south lies between a fence and the fields.  The fence surrounds the farm land on 3 sides, here on the west, the south and on the east sides.  On the other side of the fence is a densely populated forest, brush and bramble making it impossible to go west at the present time.  To the east is the carrot field.  Farmer's Row is north of here.

North.description: You see  Farmer's Row.

East.description: You see the carrot field.

South.description: You see a small dirt path.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of a forest, it looks impassable.

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (27)
rooms.description: This is the very northwestern edge of the farmers' fields, with the fence marking its boundaries visible to the west. Carrots grow here, their feathery tops arranged in neatly tended rows, extending to the east and south.

extras.text: This orange vegetable would make any rabbit smile (if rabbits could smile).

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (28)
rooms.description: Well tended rows of feathery-topped carrots grow in this field. It is a large field, too, extending in all directions save north, where the long Farmer's Row runs across.

extras.text: This orange vegetable would make any rabbit smile (if rabbits could smile).

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (29)
rooms.description: Well tended rows of feathery-topped carrots grow in this field. It is a large field, too, extending in all directions save north, where the long Farmer's Row runs across.

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (30)
rooms.description: Well tended rows of feathery-topped carrots grow in this field. It is a large field, too, extending in all directions save north, where the long Farmer's Row runs across.

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (31)
rooms.description: Fluffy carrot tops blow in every breeze across this ripening field. There are several narrow roads around it, including Farmer's Row to the north and the Western Path running to the east. The carrot patch itself continues to the south and west.

rooms.name: The Western Path (32)
rooms.description: This little dirt path runs from north to south through various fields. A carrot patch lies westward, and to the east a fallow field can be seen. Farmer's Row is directly northward.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (33)
rooms.description: This is the western edge of the clover field. There is little of interest here, for the land is fallow this season. Not even animals graze upon the sweet clover. A path marking the field's boundary is visible to the west, and Farmer's Row runs to the north.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (34)
rooms.description: Only soft sweet green clover grows in this field. There doesn't appear to be any other use for the area. Farmer's Row lies northward, but the clover field continues in all other directions.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (35)
rooms.description: Only soft sweet green clover grows in this field. There doesn't appear to be any other use for the area. Farmer's Row lies northward, but the clover field continues in all other directions.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (36)
rooms.description: Only soft sweet green clover grows in this field. There doesn't appear to be any other use for the area. Farmer's Row lies northward, but the clover field continues in all other directions.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (37)
rooms.description: Only soft, sweet clover grows in this field. There isn't even any livestock grazing here. The fallow land continues to the south and west, with Farmer's Row to the north and the Main Path to the east.

rooms.name: The Main Path (38)
rooms.description: This little dirt path runs from north to south from Farmer's Row down out of sight among fields of growing plants. Clover grows to the west, and long trellises of tomatoes to the east.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (39)
rooms.description: Well-tended rows of tomatoes grow on trellises in neatly pruned rows. The smell of ripening tomatoes is quite strong here, and among the green leaves one can see the red dots of the fruit. This is the western edge of the patch, with the Main Path to the west and Farmer's Row directly north.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (40)
rooms.description: Neatly tended rows of tomato plants extend in all directions, their ripe fruit bobbing from trellises. The field of tomatoes is very large. Farmer's Row is directly to the north.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (41)
rooms.description: Farmer's Row is to the north.  The tomato patch continues on to the east, south, and west.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (42)
rooms.description: Long rows of trellised tomato plants grow here in neatly tended patches of green spotted with red fruit. The air is scented subtly with the plants, the breezes blowing past the green leaves constantly. The patch extends in all directions save north, where Farmer's Row runs past.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (43)
rooms.description: Long rows of tomato trellises grow along this field. The ripening tomatoes have a pleasant scent, when the breeze blows. Farmer's Row runs to the north, and the Eastern Path is visible to the east. The fields of tomatoes extend to the south and west.

rooms.name: The Eastern Path (44)
rooms.description: This narrow dirt path runs between a tomato patch to the west and a golden wheat field to the east. The path looks fairly well tended, and is clear of debris. Farmer's Row runs past to the north.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (45)
rooms.description: Farmer's Row is to the north.  The Eastern path is to the west.  The wheat field continues to the east and south.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (46)
rooms.description: Farmer's Row is to the north.  The wheat field continues to the east, south, and west.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (47)
rooms.description: Farmer's Row is to the north.  The wheat field continues to the east, south, and west.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (48)
rooms.description: Golden wheat sways gently with the wind.  Farmer's Row is to the north. The wheat field continues to the east, south and west.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (49)
rooms.description: The lush golden wheat fields blow in the breezes, bringing the pleasant scent of beer across the field. A small path lies to the east, but the field itself continues to the south and west. Farmer's Row can be seen just to the north.

rooms.name: Along The Eastern Fence (50)
rooms.description: A small dirt path lies between a fence and the fields.  Beyond the fence is the west wall.  The path continues to the south.  The wheat fields are to the west.  Farmer's Row is north of here.

North.description: You see Farmer's Row.

South.description: You see a small path along the fence.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of the west wall.

rooms.name: Along The Western Fence (51)
rooms.description: You are on a small dirt path along the western fence.  To the east is the carrot field.  The path along the fence continues north and south.  Farmer's Row is due north.

North.description: You see a small dirt path. Farther to the north is Farmer's Row.

East.description: You see the carrot field.

South.description: You see a small dirt path.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of a forest, it looks impossible to enter.

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (52)
rooms.description: A well-tended field of growing carrots grows here. The feathery tops of the carrots blow in every breeze, bringing the pleasant scent of growing plants. The fence marking off the boundary of the fields is visible to the west.

extras.text: This orange vegetable would make any rabbit smile (if rabbits could smile).

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (53)
rooms.description: Orderly rows of carrot plants grow in a large field. The rows are hoed and pruned well, and the feathery tops blow in the breeze. The field extends in all directions.

extras.text: This orange vegetable would make any rabbit smile (if rabbits could smile).

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (54)
rooms.description: Orderly rows of carrot plants grow in a large field. The rows are hoed and pruned well, and the feathery tops blow in the breeze. The field extends in all directions.

extras.text: This orange vegetable would make any rabbit smile (if rabbits could smile).

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (55)
rooms.description: Orderly rows of carrot plants grow in a large field. The rows are hoed and pruned well, and the feathery tops blow in the breeze. The field extends in all directions.

extras.text: This orange vegetable would make any rabbit smile (if rabbits could smile).

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (56)
rooms.description: Fluffy carrot tops blow in every breeze across this ripening field. The field extends in all directions save to the east, where a path runs along the boundary of the field.

rooms.name: The Western Path (57)
rooms.description: This is the Western path.  It divides the carrot patch from the clover field.  Farmer's Row is due north.  The carrot patch is to the west and to the east is the clover field.  The Western path continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (58)
rooms.description: This is the western edge of the clover field. There is little of interest here, for the land is fallow this season. Not even animals graze upon the sweet clover. A path marking the field's boundary is visible to the west.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (59)
rooms.description: A lush clover field extends in all directions. Not even animals graze upon the sweet clover, and the field obviously lies fallow this season.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (60)
rooms.description: A lush clover field extends in all directions. Not even animals graze upon the sweet clover, and the field obviously lies fallow this season.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (61)
rooms.description: A lush clover field extends in all directions. Not even animals graze upon the sweet clover, and the field obviously lies fallow this season.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (62)
rooms.description: This is the eastern edge of a very large field of clover. The field lays fallow, with not even animals grazing upon it. The Main Path runs just to the east here.

rooms.name: The Main Path (63)
rooms.description: The Main path divides the clover field from the tomato patch and there is a well on the path.  Farmer's Row is due north.  The clover field is to the west. The tomato patch is to the east.  The Main path continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (64)
rooms.description: Well-tended rows of tomatoes grow on trellises in neatly pruned rows. The smell of ripening tomatoes is quite strong here, and among the green leaves one can see the red dots of the fruit. This is the western edge of the patch, with the Main Path to the west.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (65)
rooms.description: Neatly tended rows of tomato plants extend in all directions, their ripe fruit bobbing from trellises. The field of tomatoes is very large.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (66)
rooms.description: Beautiful trellises of tomatoes grow in neat, orderly rows in this field. Each plant is carefully tended, and the breeze carries the scent of tomatoes on it. The patch extends in all directions but south, where a road runs.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (67)
rooms.description: Long rows of trellised tomato plants grow here in neatly tended patches of green spotted with red fruit. The air is scented subtly with the plants, the breezes blowing past the green leaves constantly. The patch extends in all directions.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (68)
rooms.description: Long rows of tomato trellises grow along this field. The ripening tomatoes have a pleasant scent, when the breeze blows. The fields extend in all directions but to the east, where a path is visible.

rooms.name: The Eastern Path (69)
rooms.description: This narrow little dirt path divides the tomato patch to the west and the wheat fields to the east. The path extends north all the way to Farmer's Row, and south for a short distance.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (70)
rooms.description: Farmer's Row is due north.  The wheat field continues to the north, east, south, and west.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (74)

rooms.name: Along The Eastern Fence (75)
rooms.description: The north/south path continues in both directions.  The wheat field is to the west.  Farmer's Row is due north.

North.description: You see the small path. Due north is Farmer's Row.

extras.text: The wooden fence is sturdy, but could use a coat of paint. Through some small holes in the fence you see the west wall.

rooms.name: Along The Western Fence (76)
rooms.description: The north/south path continues in both directions.  To the east is the carrot field.

South.description: You see a small dirt path.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of a forest, it looks impossible to enter.

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (77)
rooms.description: To the west is along the Western fence.  The carrot patch continues to the north, east,and south.  Farmer's Row is due north.

extras.text: This orange vegetable would make any rabbit smile (if rabbits could smile).

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (78)
rooms.description: Orderly rows of carrot plants grow in a large field. The rows are hoed and pruned well, and the feathery tops blow in the breeze. The field extends in all directions.

rooms.name: The Main Path (113)
rooms.description: The path runs to the north and south through farmlands. Clover fields, fallow and rich with green, fragrant clover, grow to the west, and a large tomato patch grows to the east. The path widens into a circle near the middle of this part of it.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (114)
rooms.description: Well-tended rows of tomatoes grow on trellises in neatly pruned rows. The smell of ripening tomatoes is quite strong here, and among the green leaves one can see the red dots of the fruit. This is the western edge of the patch, with the Main Path to the west.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (120)
rooms.description: Fields of golden wheat sway in every slightest breeze to create a rippling effect. The field extends to the north, south, and east, with a path visible to the west.

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (127)
rooms.description: To the west is the path along the Western fence.  The carrot patch continues to the north and east.  To the south is the Southern path.  Farmer's Row is due north.

extras.text: This orange vegetable would make any rabbit smile (if rabbits could smile).

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (128)
rooms.description: The field is full of carrots growing in neat, orderly rows. All that is visible of the vegetables is their feathery green tops blowing in the breezes. The Southern Path runs along the southern edge of this field, heading east to west.

extras.text: This orange vegetable would make any rabbit smile (if rabbits could smile).

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (129)
rooms.description: The field is full of carrots growing in neat, orderly rows. All that is visible of the vegetables is their feathery green tops blowing in the breezes. The Southern Path runs along the southern edge of this field, heading east to west.

extras.text: This orange vegetable would make any rabbit smile (if rabbits could smile).

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (130)
rooms.description: The field is full of carrots growing in neat, orderly rows. All that is visible of the vegetables is their feathery green tops blowing in the breezes. The Southern Path runs along the southern edge of this field, heading east to west.

extras.text: This orange vegetable would make any rabbit smile (if rabbits could smile).

rooms.name: Carrot Top Heaven (131)
rooms.description: Fluffy carrot tops blow in every breeze across this ripening field. The field extends in all directions save to the east, where a path runs along the field's boundaries, and the south, where the Southern Path runs across.

extras.text: This orange vegetable would make any rabbit smile (if rabbits could smile).

rooms.name: The Western Path (132)
rooms.description: This narrow dirt road runs north to south toward another road, forming an intersection just to the south. It divides the clover fields to the east from the carrot fields to the west.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (133)
rooms.description: This is the western edge of the clover field. There is little of interest here, for the land is fallow this season. Not even animals graze upon the sweet clover. A path marking the field's boundary is visible to the west, and the Southern Path along the south.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (134)
rooms.description: Soft beds of sweet clover, mostly three-leafed, grows in this fallow field. No other use is made of it, and not even animals graze here. The Southern Path runs along the south part of this field, with houses visible beyond that.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (135)
rooms.description: Soft beds of sweet clover, mostly three-leafed, grows in this fallow field. No other use is made of it, and not even animals graze here. The Southern Path runs along the south part of this field, with houses visible beyond that.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (136)
rooms.description: Soft beds of sweet clover, mostly three-leafed, grows in this fallow field. No other use is made of it, and not even animals graze here. The Southern Path runs along the south part of this field, with houses visible beyond that.

rooms.name: The Clover Field (137)
rooms.description: Soft beds of sweet clover, mostly three-leafed, grows in this fallow field. No other use is made of it, and not even animals graze here. The Southern Path runs along the south part of this field, with houses visible beyond that. The Main Path runs just to the east.

rooms.name: The Main Path (138)
rooms.description: There is a well to the north.  Farmer's Row is due north.  The clover field is to the west.  The tomato patch is to the east.  The Main path continues to the north and intersects with the Southern path to the south.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (139)
rooms.description: Long rows of tomato trellises grow along this field. The ripening tomatoes have a pleasant scent, when the breeze blows. The fields extend to the north and east, with paths forming their boundary to the south and west. The Main Path runs just west of here.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (140)
rooms.description: Long rows of tomato trellises grow along this field. The ripening tomatoes have a pleasant scent, when the breeze blows. The fields extend in all directions but to the south, where a path is visible.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (141)
rooms.description: Long rows of tomato trellises grow along this field. The ripening tomatoes have a pleasant scent, when the breeze blows. The fields extend in all directions but to the south, where a path is visible.

rooms.description: Long rows of tomato trellises grow along this field. The ripening tomatoes have a pleasant scent, when the breeze blows. The fields extend in all directions but to the south, where a path is visible.

rooms.name: The Tomato Patch (143)
rooms.description: Long rows of tomato trellises grow along this field. The ripening tomatoes have a pleasant scent, when the breeze blows. The fields extend to the north and west, bounded at the east and south by paths.

rooms.name: The Eastern Path (144)
rooms.description: This narrow little dirt path divides the tomato patch to the west and the wheat fields to the east. The path extends north all the way to Farmer's Row, and south for a short distance.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (145)
rooms.description: Farmer's Row is due north.  The wheat field continues to the north and east. The Eastern path is to the west.  The Southern path is to the south.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (146)
rooms.description: Farmer's Row is due north.  The wheat field continues to the north, east, and west.  The Southern path is to the south.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (147)
rooms.description: Farmer's Row is due north.  The wheat field continues to the north, east, and west.  The Southern path is to the south.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (148)
rooms.description: Farmer's Row is to the north.  The wheat field continues to the north, east, and west.  The Southern path is to the south.

rooms.name: The Wheat Field (149)
rooms.description: Farmer's Row is further north.  Along the eastern fence is to the east. The Wheat field continues to the north and west.  The Southern path is to the south.

rooms.name: Along The Eastern Fence (150)
rooms.description: The north/south path continues in both directions.  The wheat fields are to the west.

North.description: You see the small path. Farmer's Row is due north.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of the west wall.

rooms.name: Along The Western Fence (151)
rooms.description: The fields have ended and you see the Southern path running east between the fields and the farmer's huts.  The path along the western fence continues north and south.

North.description: You see a small dirt path. Farther to the north is Farmer's Row.

East.description: You see yet another dirt path, this one between the fields and the farmer's huts.

South.description: You see a small dirt path.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of a forest, it looks impossible to enter.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (152)
rooms.description: The Southern path divides the fields from the farmer's huts.  The carrot patch is to the north.  The Southern path runs east/west.  The farmer's yard is to the south.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (153)
rooms.description: The east/west path continues.  The carrot patch is to the north.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (154)
rooms.description: The east/west path continues.  The carrot patch is to the north.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (155)
rooms.description: The east/west path continues in both directions.  The carrot patch is to the north.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (156)
rooms.description: The east/west path continues.  The carrot patch is to the north.  To the south is the farmer's yard.

rooms.name: The Southern/Western Path Intersection (157)
rooms.description: The Western path meets the Southern path and ends here.  The Southern path continues east and west.  The Western path is to the north and to the south is the farmer's yard.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (158)
rooms.description: This little path runs along the south end of the farmers' fields. It is narrow and full of ruts, but easily enough traveled. Small crude houses are visible all around the south here.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (159)
rooms.description: This little path runs along the south end of the farmers' fields. It is narrow and full of ruts, but easily enough traveled. Small crude houses are visible all around the south here.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (160)
rooms.description: This little path runs along the south end of the farmers' fields. It is narrow and full of ruts, but easily enough traveled. Small crude houses are visible all around the south here.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (161)
rooms.description: The dirt path runs along the southern part of the fields. To the south, houses are visible. Clover fields lie to the north.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (162)
rooms.description: The east/west path continues.  The clover field is to the north.  The farmer's yard is to the south.

rooms.name: The Southern/Main Path Intersection (163)
rooms.description: The Main path meets the Southern path and ends here.  The Main path continues on to the north.  The Southern path continues to the east and west. The farmer's yard is to the south.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (164)
rooms.description: The Southern path continues east and west.  The tomato patch is to the north.  The farmer's yard is to the south.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (165)
rooms.description: The Southern path continues east and west.  The tomato patch is to the north.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (166)
rooms.description: The east/west path continues in both directions.  The tomato patch is to the north.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (167)
rooms.description: The east/west path continues in both directions.  The tomato patch is to the north.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (168)
rooms.description: The Southern path continues east and west.  The tomato patch is to the north.  The farmer's yard is to the south.

rooms.name: The Southern/Eastern Path Intersection (169)
rooms.description: The Eastern path meets with the Southern path and ends here.  The Southern path continues east and west.  The farmer's yard is to the south.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (170)
rooms.description: The Southern path continues to the east and west.  The wheat field is to the north.  The farmer's yard is to the south.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (171)
rooms.description: The east/west path goes on in both directions.  To the north is the wheat field.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (172)
rooms.description: The east/west path goes on in both directions.  To the north is the wheat field.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (173)
rooms.description: The east/west path goes on in both directions.  To the north is the wheat field.

rooms.name: The Southern Path (174)
rooms.description: The narrow path runs from east to west at the southern end of the fields. A golden wheat field grows to the north, and houses can be seen standing to the south.

rooms.name: Along The Eastern Fence (175)
rooms.description: The fields have ended and you see the Southern path running west between the fields and the farmer's huts.  The path along the fence continues to the north and south.

North.description: You see the small path. Farmer's Row is due north.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of the west wall.

rooms.name: Along The Western Fence (176)
rooms.description: The path along the western fence continues north and south.  To the east lies the farmer's yard.

North.description: You see the small path immeadiately north of you and farther north you see Farmer's Row.

East.description: The farmer's wife has really made the old farm yard look inviting, hasn't she?

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of a forest, it looks impossible to enter.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Yard (177)
rooms.description: The farmer's wife has worked hard to make the farmer's home look nice. There are many flowers, plants and bushes in the yard.  To the north is the Southern path.  To the east is the kitchen.  To the west is the path along the western fence.  The path along the southern fence is to the south.  Farmer's Row is due north.

rooms.name: The Farm Kitchen (178)
rooms.description: You are now in the farmer's kitchen.  Do you always just walk into a stranger's house with out knocking?  You see an old fashioned iron stove in the corner.  There is a fireplace in the middle of the south wall.  There is also a table in the middle of the room.  The farmer's yard is to the west and the living room is to the east.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Living Room (179)
rooms.description: You really should go before the farmer or his wife get home and catch you snooping.  The kitchen is to the west and to the east is the bedroom.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Bedroom (180)
rooms.description: The bed is made and floor has been swept.  The farmer's wife is a great homemaker!  The only exits are the living room to the west and the yard to the east.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Yard (181)
rooms.description: The back yard is as neat as the front.  To the north is the Southern path. The bedroom is to the west and the yard continues to the east.  The path along the southern fence is to the south.  Farmer's Row is due north.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Yard (182)
rooms.description: Nothing tangible seperates one yard from the other, and they all look the same.  The yard continues to the east and west.  To the north is the Southern path.  The path along the southern fence is to the south.  Farmer's Row is due north.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Yard (183)
rooms.description: The lilac trees are in full bloom.  They look so pretty.  The kitchen is to the east.  To the north is the Southern path.  The path along the southern fence is to the south.  To the west the yard continues.  Farmer's Row is due north.

rooms.name: The Farm Kitchen (184)
rooms.description: You are now in the farmer's kitchen.  Do you always just walk into a stranger's house with out knocking?  You see an old fashioned iron stove in the corner.  There is a fireplace in the middle of the south wall.  There is also a table in the middle of the room.  The farmer's yard is to the west and the living room is to the east.

Down.description: A cellar door blocks the way down.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Living Room (185)
rooms.description: A few pieces of simple furniture have been placed around the living room. As in the kitchen there is a fireplace along the southern wall.  The kitchen is to the west and to the east is the bedroom.

extras.text: A bright and cheery fire has been lit to guard against the cold.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Bedroom (186)
rooms.description: The bed is made and the floor has been swept.  The farmer's wife is a great homemaker!  The only exits are the living room to the west and the farmer's yard to the east.

extras.text: The bed is made and looks quite comfortable.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Yard (187)
rooms.description: To the north is the Southern path.  The path along the southern fence is to the south.  The farmer's bedroom is to the west and the yard goes on to the east.  Farmer's Row is due north.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Yard (188)
rooms.description: The yard continues to the east and west.  To the north is the Southern/Main path intersection.  The path along the southern fence is to the south. Farmer's Row is due north.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Yard (189)
rooms.description: The yard continues to the west.  The kitchen is to the east.  To the north is the Southern path.  The path along the southern fence is to the south. Farmer's Row is due north.

rooms.name: The Farm Kitchen (190)
rooms.description: You are now in the farmer's kitchen.  Do you always just walk into a stranger's house with out knocking?  You see an old fashioned iron stove in the corner.  There is a fireplace in the middle of the south wall.  There is also a table in the middle of the room.  The farmer's yard is to the west and the living room is to the east.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Living Room (191)
rooms.description: The flowers make the living room smell nice.  There is a fireplace in each room of the hut.  The kitchen is to the west and to the east is the bedroom.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Bedroom (192)
rooms.description: Just like all the other rooms the bedroom is as neat as a pin.  There is a fireplace along the southern wall.  The only exits are the living room to the west and the yard to the east.

extras.text: The wood is here and ready to go. All you need is a match!
It may be simple, but it sure looks inviting...care to take a nap?

rooms.name: The Farmer's Yard (193)
rooms.description: The Farmer's yard continues to the east.  To the west is the farmer's hut. The Southern path is to the north.  To the south is along the southern fence.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Yard (194)
rooms.description: The Farmer's yard continues east and west.  The Southern path is to the north.  To the south is along the southern fence.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Yard (195)
rooms.description: The farmer's wife has worked hard to make the farmer's home look nice.  She has planted many flowers and plants in the yard.  The kitchen is to the east. To the north is the Southern path.  The path along the fence is to the south. Farmer's Row is due north.

rooms.name: The Farm Kitchen (196)
rooms.description: This small, primitive kitchen has a wooden floor and several racks and shelves filled with cooking utensils. A stove in one corner gives off plenty of warmth in cold weather.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Living Room (197)
rooms.description: The fireplace has a roaring fire in it, and the place is clean and tidy. Doors lead east and west.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Bedroom (198)
rooms.description: The bed is made and floor has been swept.  The farmer's wife is a great homemaker!  The only exits are the living room to the west and the yard to the east.

rooms.name: The Farmer's Yard (199)
rooms.description: The Southern path is to the north.  Along the eastern fence is to the east. To the south is along the Southern fence.  The farmer's hut is to the west.

rooms.name: Along The Eastern Fence (200)
rooms.description: The path along the fence continues to the north and south.  The farmer's yard is to the west.

North.description: You see the small path. Farmer's Row is due north.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of the west wall.

rooms.name: Along The Fence (SW Corner) (201)
rooms.description: This is the southwest corner of the farmlands.  You can go north along the western fence, or south into a rocky area.  A small dirt path leads east.

North.description: You see a small dirt path. Farther to the north is Farmer's Row.

East.description: You see a small dirt path. Farther to the east you see the west wall of the city looming over the fence.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of a forest, it looks impossible to enter.

rooms.name: Along The Southern Fence (202)
rooms.description: The small dirt path runs east/west along the southern fence.  Farmer's Row is due north.  There is a gap in the fence to the south, but you can't see where it leads.  You can go east or west along the southern fence or north to the farmer's yard or south which leads to the unknown.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of a forest, it looks impossible to enter.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of a forest, it looks impossible to enter.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of a forest, it looks impossible to enter.

rooms.name: A Gate in the Southern Fence (217)
rooms.description: The small dirt path runs east/west here, between the farmer's house to the north and the southern fence.  A gate opens in the fence here.  There is a path beyond the gate running south up a hill.

East.description: You see the small path.

South.description: It's an open sort of gate - really just a big opening with a post at either side to support the fence.  The path beyond rises very slowly as it approaches a hill to the southeast.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of a forest, it looks impossible to enter.

rooms.name: Along The Fence (SE Corner) (225)
rooms.description: This is the southeast corner of the farmlands.  You can go north along the eastern fence or west along the southern fence.

North.description: You see the small path.  Farmer's Row is due north.

extras.text: The fence looks very sturdy, but could use a coat of paint! There are some small holes in the fence. Through the holes you see glimpses of the west wall.

rooms.name: Storeroom (W)
rooms.description: This is a storeroom where stocks of different vegetables are kept by the farmer in case of a bad season.  There's mold along the floorboards, and a dank smell fills the room.  The storeroom continues to the east.

Up.description: An outline in the ceiling wood could probably be opened.

rooms.name: Storeroom (E)
rooms.description: Wooden walls line this underground storage area.  The dank smell of moisture and mold permeate the room.  The only exit is west.
